DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_Successfully casting a spell increases your casting speed by <SpellCastingSpeed>[0]%</>, up to 5 times. The effect lasts for <Duration>[0] seconds</> and is reset each time it increases.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: Successfully casting a spell increases your casting speed by <SpellCastingSpeed>[0]%</>, up to 5 times. The effect lasts for <Duration>[0] seconds</> and is reset each time it increases.
